p: It has well established that the diethyl ether extract of the leaves of A. nilagirica demonstrated antimicrobial properties against the soil-borned plant pathogen i.e., Phytophthora capsici. The disc diffusion method has been applied to perform the antimicrobial activity. The results showed that the mycelial development of P. capsici entirely suppressed by a concentration of 100Â ppm of the oil in the carrot agar vehicle and shown in Table 4.
